00001 class RpalError : public exception{
00002  public:
00003  RpalError( int type, string message): _message(message), _type(type){
00004     
00005   };
00006   
00007   virtual const char* what() const throw()
00008   {
00009     cout  << _message << endl;
00010     return buildErrorStr();
00011   }
00012   const static int  LEXER = 1;
00013   const static int PARSER = 2;
00014   const static int INTERNAL = 3;
00015   const static int INTERPRETER = 4;
00016

00019  private:
00020   const char* buildErrorStr() const throw(){
00021     switch(_type){
00022     case RpalError::LEXER:
00023       return string("LEXER Error: " + _message).c_str();
00024     case RpalError::PARSER:
00025       return string("PARSER Error: " + _message).c_str();
00026     case RpalError::INTERPRETER:
00027       return string("INTERPRETER Error: " + _message).c_str();
00028     case RpalError::INTERNAL:
00029       return string("INTERNAL Error: " + _message).c_str();
00030     default:
00031       return "UNKNOWN ERROR";
00032     };
00033   };
00034   const string _message;
00035   const int _type;
00036 };
